LightningComponentBundle.description: Creates new journals on Account records with two-tier permission-based DocFab selection.

property.name: recordModelIds
property.label: Record Model IDs
property.description: Comma-separated list of DocFab Record Model IDs (e.g., '160, 54, 22'). Leave empty to allow all models the user has permission for.

property.name: formNumbers
property.label: Form Numbers
property.description: Comma-separated list of DocFab Form Numbers (e.g., '17, 51, 22'). Required for form selection.

property.name: buttonLabel
property.label: Button Label
property.description: The label displayed on the button.

property.name: buttonIcon
property.label: Button Icon
property.description: SLDS icon name for the button (e.g., 'utility:add', 'action:new_note'). Defaults to 'utility:add' if not specified.
